poisonstrike.name: Poison Strike
poisonstrike.desc: If unit initiates combat, deals damage to foe equal to 20% of their max HP after combat.

savageblow.name: Savage Blow
savageblow.desc: If unit initiates combat, deals damage to foes within 2 spaces equal to 20% of their max HP after combat.

swordbreaker.name: Swordbreaker
swordbreaker.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a sword equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.

lancebreaker.name: Lancebreaker
lancebreaker.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a lance equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.

axebreaker.name: Axebreaker
axebreaker.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has an axe equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.

tomebreaker.name: Tomebreaker
tomebreaker.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a tome equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.

bowbreaker.name: Bowbreaker
bowbreaker.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a bow equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.

knifebreaker.name: Knifebreaker
knifebreaker.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has a knife equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.

artbreaker.name: Artbreaker
artbreaker.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or higher at start of combat and foe has an art equipped, unit can follow up and foe cannot follow up.

sealstrength.name: Seal Strength
sealstrength.desc: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Str-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)

sealmagic.name: Seal Magic
sealmagic.desc: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Mag-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)

sealdefense.name: Seal Defense
sealdefense.desc: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Def-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)

sealspeed.name: Seal Speed
sealspeed.desc: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Spd-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)

sealresistance.name: Seal Resistance
sealresistance.desc: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Res-6 on foe after combat. (Penalty shrinks by 1 each turn.)

fiercestance.name: Fierce Stance
fiercestance.desc: If foe initiates combat, grants Str+6 during combat.

steadystance.name: Steady Stance
steadystance.desc: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.

dartingstance.name: Darting Stance
dartingstance.desc: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

wardingstance.name: Warding Stance
wardingstance.desc: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+6 during combat.

lifeanddeath.name: Life and Death
lifeanddeath.desc: Unit deals +10 damage and takes +10 damage during combat.

triangleadept.name: Triangle Adept
triangleadept.desc: When unit has weapon advantage, always follows up. When unit has disadvantage, foe always follows up.

corneredbeast.name: Cornered Beast
corneredbeast.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or less at start of combat, grants Crit+30 during combat.

selfdestruct.name: Self-Destruct
selfdestruct.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or less at the start of player phase, unit dies and deals 50% of its max HP to foes within 2 spaces.

duelistsblow.name: Duelist's Blow
duelistsblow.desc: When unit initiates combat, grants Avo+30 during combat.

dartingblow.name: Darting Blow
dartingblow.desc: When unit initiates combat, grants Spd+5 during combat.

deathblow.name: Death Blow
deathblow.desc: When unit initiates combat, grants Crit+20 during combat.

certainblow.name: Certain Blow
certainblow.desc: When unit initiates combat, grants Hit+40 during combat.

armoredblow.name: Armored Blow
armoredblow.desc: When unit initiates combat, unit takes 10 less physical damage during combat.

wardingblow.name: Warding Blow
wardingblow.desc: When unit initiates combat, unit takes 20 less magical damage during combat.

spiritstrike.name: Spirit Strike
spiritstrike.desc: When unit hits with an attack, inflicts -5 to foe's engage meter.

anchor.name: Anchor
anchor.desc: Unit cannot be moved by skills, smash weapons, etc.

veteran.name: Veteran
veteran.desc: Prevents unit from being broken. Reduces damage from effectiveness.

veteran+.name: Veteran+
veteran+.desc: Prevents unit from being broken. Negates damage from effectiveness.

voidcurse.name: Void Curse
voidcurse.desc: Foes do not earn EXP fighting this unit.

fellbarrier.name: Fell Barrier
fellbarrier.desc: A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Nullifies Effective: Fell Dragon and prevents 50% of damage to unit.

fellbarrier+.name: Fell Barrier+
fellbarrier+.desc: A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Nullifies Effective: Fell Dragon and prevents 70% of damage to unit.

fellbarrier++.name: Fell Barrier++
fellbarrier++.desc: A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Nullifies Effective: Fell Dragon and prevents 85% of damage to unit.

fellbarrier+++.name: Fell Barrier+++
fellbarrier+++.desc: A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Nullifies Effective: Fell Dragon and prevents all damage to unit.

darkbarrier.name: Dark Barrier
darkbarrier.desc: A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Prevents 20% of damage to unit.

darkbarrier+.name: Dark Barrier+
darkbarrier+.desc: A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Prevents 40% of damage to unit.

darkbarrier++.name: Dark Barrier++
darkbarrier++.desc: A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Prevents 60% of damage to unit.

darkbarrier+++.name: Dark Barrier+++
darkbarrier+++.desc: A barrier created by Dark Emblems. Prevents 80% of damage to unit.

bondbreaker.name: Bond Breaker
bondbreaker.desc: Makes enemy chain attack accuracy always 30%. Reduces damage taken.

swordagility1.name: Sword Agility 1
swordagility1.desc: Grants Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

swordagility2.name: Sword Agility 2
swordagility2.desc: Grants Avo+15 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

swordagility3.name: Sword Agility 3
swordagility3.desc: Grants Avo+20 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

swordagility4.name: Sword Agility 4
swordagility4.desc: Grants Avo+25 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

swordagility5.name: Sword Agility 5
swordagility5.desc: Grants Avo+30 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

swordpower1.name: Sword Power 1
swordpower1.desc: Grants Atk+2 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

swordpower2.name: Sword Power 2
swordpower2.desc: Grants Atk+4 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

swordpower3.name: Sword Power 3
swordpower3.desc: Grants Atk+6 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

swordpower4.name: Sword Power 4
swordpower4.desc: Grants Atk+8 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

swordpower5.name: Sword Power 5
swordpower5.desc: Grants Atk+10 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

swordfocus1.name: Sword Focus 1
swordfocus1.desc: Grants Hit+10 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

swordfocus2.name: Sword Focus 2
swordfocus2.desc: Grants Hit+15 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

swordfocus3.name: Sword Focus 3
swordfocus3.desc: Grants Hit+20 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

swordfocus4.name: Sword Focus 4
swordfocus4.desc: Grants Hit+25 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

swordfocus5.name: Sword Focus 5
swordfocus5.desc: Grants Hit+30 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

lanceagility1.name: Lance Agility 1
lanceagility1.desc: Grants Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

lanceagility2.name: Lance Agility 2
lanceagility2.desc: Grants Avo+15 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

lanceagility3.name: Lance Agility 3
lanceagility3.desc: Grants Avo+20 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

lanceagility4.name: Lance Agility 4
lanceagility4.desc: Grants Avo+25 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

lanceagility5.name: Lance Agility 5
lanceagility5.desc: Grants Avo+30 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

lancepower1.name: Lance Power 1
lancepower1.desc: Grants Atk+2 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

lancepower2.name: Lance Power 2
lancepower2.desc: Grants Atk+4 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

lancepower3.name: Lance Power 3
lancepower3.desc: Grants Atk+6 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

lancepower4.name: Lance Power 4
lancepower4.desc: Grants Atk+8 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

lancepower5.name: Lance Power 5
lancepower5.desc: Grants Atk+10 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

axepower1.name: Axe Power 1
axepower1.desc: Grants Atk+2 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

axepower2.name: Axe Power 2
axepower2.desc: Grants Atk+4 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

axepower3.name: Axe Power 3
axepower3.desc: Grants Atk+6 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

axepower4.name: Axe Power 4
axepower4.desc: Grants Atk+8 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

axepower5.name: Axe Power 5
axepower5.desc: Grants Atk+10 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

bowagility1.name: Bow Agility 1
bowagility1.desc: Grants Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

bowagility2.name: Bow Agility 2
bowagility2.desc: Grants Avo+15 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

bowagility3.name: Bow Agility 3
bowagility3.desc: Grants Avo+20 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

bowagility4.name: Bow Agility 4
bowagility4.desc: Grants Avo+25 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

bowagility5.name: Bow Agility 5
bowagility5.desc: Grants Avo+30 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

bowfocus1.name: Bow Focus 1
bowfocus1.desc: Grants Hit+10 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

bowfocus2.name: Bow Focus 2
bowfocus2.desc: Grants Hit+15 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

bowfocus3.name: Bow Focus 3
bowfocus3.desc: Grants Hit+20 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

bowfocus4.name: Bow Focus 4
bowfocus4.desc: Grants Hit+25 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

bowfocus5.name: Bow Focus 5
bowfocus5.desc: Grants Hit+30 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

artfocus1.name: Art Focus 1
artfocus1.desc: Grants Hit+10 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

artfocus2.name: Art Focus 2
artfocus2.desc: Grants Hit+15 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

artfocus3.name: Art Focus 3
artfocus3.desc: Grants Hit+20 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

artfocus4.name: Art Focus 4
artfocus4.desc: Grants Hit+25 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

artfocus5.name: Art Focus 5
artfocus5.desc: Grants Hit+30 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

knifeprecision1.name: Knife Precision 1
knifeprecision1.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+3 when using a knife.

knifeprecision2.name: Knife Precision 2
knifeprecision2.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+5 when using a knife.

knifeprecision3.name: Knife Precision 3
knifeprecision3.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+7 when using a knife.

knifeprecision4.name: Knife Precision 4
knifeprecision4.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+10 when using a knife.

knifeprecision5.name: Knife Precision 5
knifeprecision5.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+15 when using a knife.

tomeprecision1.name: Tome Precision 1
tomeprecision1.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+3 when using a tome.

tomeprecision2.name: Tome Precision 2
tomeprecision2.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+5 when using a tome.

tomeprecision3.name: Tome Precision 3
tomeprecision3.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+7 when using a tome.

tomeprecision4.name: Tome Precision 4
tomeprecision4.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+10 when using a tome.

tomeprecision5.name: Tome Precision 5
tomeprecision5.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+15 when using a tome.

staffmastery1.name: Staff Mastery 1
staffmastery1.desc: Grants Hit+10 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 3 HP.

staffmastery2.name: Staff Mastery 2
staffmastery2.desc: Grants Hit+15 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 5 HP.

staffmastery3.name: Staff Mastery 3
staffmastery3.desc: Grants Hit+20 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 7 HP.

staffmastery4.name: Staff Mastery 4
staffmastery4.desc: Grants Hit+25 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 10 HP.

staffmastery5.name: Staff Mastery 5
staffmastery5.desc: Grants Hit+30 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 15 HP.

perceptive.name: Perceptive
perceptive.desc: If the unit initiates combat, grants Avo+15 during combat. Avo increases with high Spd.

perceptive+.name: Perceptive+
perceptive+.desc: If the unit initiates combat, grants Avo+30 during combat. Avo increases with high Spd.

breakdefenses.name: Break Defenses
breakdefenses.desc: If unit's attack breaks foe, unit makes an extra attack at 50% damage.

unyielding.name: Unyielding
unyielding.desc: At start of player phase, if HP is 20% or less, restores 20% of unit's max HP.

unyielding+.name: Unyielding+
unyielding+.desc: At start of player phase, if HP is 30% or less, restores 30% of unit's max HP.

unyielding++.name: Unyielding++
unyielding++.desc: At start of player phase, if HP is 40% or less, restores 40% of unit's max HP.

divinespeed.name: Divine Speed
divinespeed.desc:
Unit performs an extra attack at 50% damage in combat.
[Covert] If extra attack hits, poisons foe.
[Dragon] Unit recovers HP equal to damage dealt by extra attack.

lodestarrush.name: Lodestar Rush
lodestarrush.desc:
Use to launch 7 consecutive sword attacks at 30% damage. Adjacent foe only.
[Dragon] +2 attacks.
[Backup] +1 attack.
[Mystical] Damage based on Mag.

canter.name: Canter
canter.desc: Unit can move 2 spaces after acting.

canter+.name: Canter+
canter+.desc: Unit can move 3 spaces after acting.

momentum.name: Momentum
momentum.desc: Grants Atk+1 to first attack during combat for each space unit moved before attacking. (Max +10)

momentum+.name: Momentum+
momentum+.desc: Grants Atk+1 to first attack during combat for each space unit moved before attacking.

gallop.name: Gallop
gallop.desc:
Grants Mov+5.
[Dragon] Grants another Mov+1.
[Cavalry] Grants another Mov+2.
[Covert] Unit does not pay extra movement cost on any terrain.

override.name: Override
override.desc:
Use to attack and move through a line of adjacent foes. Sword/lance only.
[Dragon] +20% damage.
[Armored] 10% chance of breaking target.
[Mystical] Deals extra damage=25% of Mag.
[Qi Adept] 20% chance of breaking target.

holystance.name: Holy Stance
holystance.desc: If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 10% of damage taken back to foe.

holystance+.name: Holy Stance+
holystance+.desc: If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 30% of damage taken back to foe.

holystance++.name: Holy Stance++
holystance++.desc: If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 50% of damage taken back to foe.

unholystance.name: Unholy Stance
unholystance.desc: If a non-Corrupted foe attacks unit, deals 50% of damage taken back to foe.

resonance.name: Resonance
resonance.desc: When equipped with a tome, if unit's HP is 2 or more, unit loses 1 HP at start of combat and deals +2 damage during combat.

resonance+.name: Resonance+
resonance+.desc: When equipped with a tome, if unit's HP is 2 or more, unit loses 1 HP at start of combat and deals +3 damage during combat.

favoritefood.name: Favorite Food
favoritefood.desc: When unit eats a packed lunch, its engage meter is maxed out.

echo.name: Echo
echo.desc:
Use to attack with magic at 50% damage. Use a second time to launch another 50% attack.
[Dragon] Range +1.
[Mystical] +10% damage.

warpragnarok.name: Warp Ragnarok
warpragnarok.desc:
Use to warp up to 10 spaces and make a powerful magic attack.
[Dragon] Attack range +1.
[Cavalry] Warp distance +2.
[Flying] Warp distance +5.
[Mystical] +20% damage.

darkwarp.name: Dark Warp
darkwarp.desc: Use to warp up to 5 spaces and make a powerful magic attack.

ragnarokwarp.name: Ragnarok Warp
ragnarokwarp.desc: Use to make a powerful magic attack, then warp somewhere else on the map.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.desc: Unit can equip staves up to level C.

cleric+.name: Cleric+
cleric+.desc: Unit can equip staves up to level B.

cleric++.name: Cleric++
cleric++.desc: Unit can equip staves up to level A.

healinglight.name: Healing Light
healinglight.desc: When unit heals an ally with a staff, unit also recovers HP=50% of the amount healed.

augment.name: Augment
augment.desc:
Grants staff range +5 and area of effect +1.
[Dragon] Additional staff range +1.
[Qi Adept] +20% to HP healed by staves.

darkaugment.name: Dark Augment
darkaugment.desc: Grants staff range +3 and area of effect +1.

greatsacrifice.name: Great Sacrifice
greatsacrifice.desc:
Use to restore full HP to all allies, even those not under the player's control. After use, unit's HP=1.
[Dragon] Unit's HP=30% current.
[Armored] Grants Def+1 to all healed during their next combat.
[Qi Adept] Also cures status.

holdout.name: Hold Out
holdout.desc: If unit had 30% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.

holdout+.name: Hold Out+
holdout+.desc: If unit had 20% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.

holdout++.name: Hold Out++
holdout++.desc: If unit had 10% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.

holdout+++.name: Hold Out+++
holdout+++.desc: If unit had 2 HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.

advance.name: Advance
advance.desc: Use to move 1 space toward a foe that is 2 spaces away and attack.

riseabove.name: Rise Above
riseabove.desc:
Grants Lvl+5.
[Dragon] Additional Lvl+1.
[Cavalry] Mov+1.
[Armored] Max HP+5.

blazinglion.name: Blazing Lion
blazinglion.desc:
Use to attack adjacent foe and an area 3 spaces wide. Target area and the 2 rows beyond it are set on fire. Sword only.
[Dragon] Expands attack area.
[Mystical] Expands flame area.

armsshield.name: Arms Shield
armsshield.desc: When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 3 less damage.

armsshield+.name: Arms Shield+
armsshield+.desc: When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 5 less damage.

armsshield++.name: Arms Shield++
armsshield++.desc: When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 7 less damage.

vantage.name: Vantage
vantage.desc: If unit's HP is 25% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe's first attack.

vantage+.name: Vantage+
vantage+.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe's first attack.

vantage++.name: Vantage++
vantage++.desc: If unit's HP is 75% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe's first attack.

adaptable.name: Adaptable
adaptable.desc:
If foe initiates combat, unit counters with the best weapon available (in terms of range, weapon advantage, effective bonus, etc.).
[Dragon] Hit+30 during combat.
[Backup] Crit+10 during combat.
[Covert] Avo+20 during combat.
[Armored] Def+5 during combat.
[Flying] Res+5 during combat.

quadruplehit.name: Quadruple Hit
quadruplehit.desc:
Use to attack once each with sword, lance, axe, and bow.
[Dragon] +20% damage.
[Covert] Foes may drop 1,000G. Trigger %=Lck.
[Qi Adept] Breaks foe.

dualstrike.name: Dual Strike
dualstrike.desc: Unit participates in chain attacks as if it were a backup unit.

dualassist.name: Dual Assist
dualassist.desc: If unit is able to chain attack, unit will do so when allies attack foes unit could reach by moving. Trigger %=35.

dualassist+.name: Dual Assist+
dualassist+.desc: If unit is able to chain attack, unit will do so when allies attack foes unit could reach by moving. Trigger %=70.

dualsupport.name: Dual Support
dualsupport.desc: Grants a bonus to Avo that increases with unit's support level with adjacent allies. (Max +90)

bondedshield.name: Bonded Shield
bondedshield.desc:
Use to prevent first attacks on adjacent allies until your next turn. Trigger %=80.
[Dragon] +10% to trigger rate.
[Cavalry] Trigger %=100 for cavalry allies.
[Armored] Trigger %=100 for armored allies.
[Flying] Trigger %=100 for flying allies.
[Qi Adept] Trigger %=100.

allforone.name: All for One
allforone.desc:
Use to make a sword attack against an adjacent foe. All allies within 2 spaces chain attack.
[Dragon] Ally chain attacks are guaranteed to hit.
[Backup] Range +1.

alacrity.name: Alacrity
alacrity.desc: If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 9 or more, unit's follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.

alacrity+.name: Alacrity+
alacrity+.desc: If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 7 or more, unit's follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.

alacrity++.name: Alacrity++
alacrity++.desc: If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 5 or more, unit's follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.

speedtaker.name: Speedtaker
speedtaker.desc: Grants a stacking Spd+2 each time unit initiates combat and defeats a foe. Bonus lasts for the rest of the battle. (Max +10)

calldoubles.name: Call Doubles
calldoubles.desc:
Creates four illusory doubles that can make chain attacks with unit.
[Dragon] +1 double created.
[Flying] Doubles have +10 Avo

astrastorm.name: Astra Storm
astrastorm.desc:
Use to launch 5 bow attacks at 30% damage, up to range 10.
[Dragon] Range +5.
[Covert] Range +10.
[Qi Adept] Breaks the target.

demolish.name: Demolish
demolish.desc: Break destructible terrain in a single blow when using Destroy.

reposition.name: Reposition
reposition.desc: Use to move an adjacent ally to the opposite side of unit.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.desc: At start of combat, for each HP the unit has lost, grants Crit+1 during combat. (Max +30)

resolve.name: Resolve
resolve.desc: If unit's HP is 75% or less after combat, grants Def/Res+5 as long as unit's HP stays below 75%.

resolve+.name: Resolve+
resolve+.desc: If unit's HP is 75% or less after combat, grants Def/Res+7 as long as unit's HP stays below 75%.

laguzfriend.name: Laguz Friend
laguzfriend.desc:
Unit takes 50% less damage, but sets unit's Avo to 0.
[Dragon] Extra -10% to damage.

greataether.name: Great Aether
greataether.desc:
Use to grant Def/Res+5, but unit can't counter for 1 turn. Next turn, attack a 2-space area, heal HP=30% of damage dealt. Sword/axe only.
[Dragon] +1 damage per hit taken.
[Armored] Grants an extra Def+5.
[Flying] Grants an extra Res+5.

divinepulse.name: Divine Pulse
divinepulse.desc: May turn a missed attack into a hit. Trigger %=30. Chance increases with high Lck.

divinepulse+.name: Divine Pulse+
divinepulse+.desc: May turn a missed attack into a hit. Trigger %=50. Chance increases with high Lck.

mentorship.name: Mentorship
mentorship.desc: Grants 1.2× EXP modifier to unit and adjacent allies.

lostfound.name: Lost & Found
lostfound.desc: If unit finishes an action or waits next to an ally, may find an item and increase support with that ally. Trigger %=Lck.

instruct.name: Instruct
instruct.desc:
Use to grant allies within 2 spaces a stat bonus based on user's type. Bonus lasts for 1 turn.
[Dragon] All seven basic stats +3.
[Backup] Str+4.
[Cavalry] Dex+10.
[Covert] Spd+5.
[Armored] Def+5.
[Flying] Res+5.
[Mystical] Mag+4.
[Qi Adept] Lck+10.

goddessdance.name: Goddess Dance
goddessdance.desc:
Use to grant another action to all adjacent allies.
[Dragon] Grants +3 to all targets' basic stats for 1 turn.
[Backup] Grants Str+4 to targets for 1 turn.
[Cavalry] Grants Dex+10 to targets for 1 turn.
[Covert] Grants Spd+5 to targets for 1 turn.
[Armored] Grants Def+5 to targets for 1 turn.
[Flying] Grants Res+5 to targets for 1 turn.
[Mystical] Grants Mag+4 to targets for 1 turn.
[Qi Adept] Grants Lck+10 to targets for 1 turn.

diabolicaldance.name: Diabolical Dance
diabolicaldance.desc:
Use to grant another action to allies within 2 spaces.
[Flying] Grants Res+5 to targets for 1 turn.

dragonvein.name: Dragon Vein
dragonvein.desc:
Use to add a special effect to certain spaces.
[Dragon] Choose any Vein effect.
[Backup] Creates stone pillars that increase Def/Res.
[Cavalry] Creates water that decreases Avo.
[Covert] Creates fog that increases Avo.
[Armored] Creates vines that grant immunity to break.
[Flying] Creates healing glow that restores HP.
[Mystical] Creates flames that inflict damage.
[Qi Adept] Creates ice pillars that hinder movement.
[Covert] Creates smoke that decreases Def/Avo.
[Qi Adept] Creates ice floor that increases movement.

draconichex.name: Draconic Hex
draconichex.desc: If unit initiates combat, inflicts -4 to all of foe's basic stats after combat. (Penalties shrink by 1 each turn.)

pairup.name: Pair Up
pairup.desc: Prevents damage from foes' chain attacks against unit.

qualitytime.name: Quality Time
qualitytime.desc: After unit acts or waits, restores 5 HP to adjacent allies and slightly increases support with them.

qualitytime+.name: Quality Time+
qualitytime+.desc: After unit acts or waits, restores 10 HP to adjacent allies and slightly increases support with them.

dreadfulaura.name: Dreadful Aura
dreadfulaura.desc:
If unit initiates combat, target foe and all foes within 1 space of it cannot move for 1 turn after combat.
[Covert] Also Avo-20 on target.

torrentialroar.name: Torrential Roar
torrentialroar.desc:
Use to attack 3 spaces in a line, turning those spaces into water terrain.
[Dragon] Range +1.

sacredtwins.name: Sacred Twins
sacredtwins.desc: While engaged with Eirika, changes Lunar Brace to Eclipse Brace and Gentility to Blue Skies for all allies.

nightandday.name: Night and Day
nightandday.desc: Use to switch Emblems and swap between Lunar Brace/Gentility and Solar Brace/Bravery for all allies.

lunarbrace.name: Lunar Brace
lunarbrace.desc: If unit initiates combat with a physical attack, deals extra damage=20% of foe's Def.

solarbrace.name: Solar Brace
solarbrace.desc: If unit initiates combat, unit recovers HP=30% of damage dealt.

eclipsebrace.name: Eclipse Brace
eclipsebrace.desc: If unit initiates combat, unit deals extra damage=20% of foe's Def with physical attacks and recovers HP=30% of damage dealt.

lunarbrace+.name: Lunar Brace+
lunarbrace+.desc: If unit initiates combat with a physical attack, deals extra damage=30% of foe's Def.

solarbrace+.name: Solar Brace+
solarbrace+.desc: If unit initiates combat, unit recovers HP=50% of damage dealt.

eclipsebrace+.name: Eclipse Brace+
eclipsebrace+.desc: If unit initiates combat, unit deals extra damage=30% of foe's Def with physical attacks and recovers HP=50% of damage dealt.

blueskies.name: Blue Skies
blueskies.desc: Unit takes 3 less damage and deals +3 damage.

blueskies+.name: Blue Skies+
blueskies+.desc: Unit takes 5 less damage and deals +5 damage.

twinstrike.name: Twin Strike
twinstrike.desc:
Use to make a sword attack followed by a lance attack from Ephraim on adjacent foe. Effective: Corrupted.
[Dragon] +20% damage.
[Cavalry] Ephraim deals +50% damage.

holyaura.name: Holy Aura
holyaura.desc: Unit is Effective: Fell Dragon. Allies within 2 spaces with Effective: Dragon gain Effective: Fell Dragon.

bondforger.name: Bond Forger
bondforger.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+20 to unit and allies within 2 spaces that are synced or engaged with an Emblem.

bondforger+.name: Bond Forger+
bondforger+.desc: Grants Hit/Avo+30 to unit and allies within 2 spaces that are synced or engaged with an Emblem.

boonofelyos.name: Boon of Elyos
boonofelyos.desc: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to Crit and Ddg equal to 2× the number of allies who have acted this turn.

attuned.name: Attuned
attuned.desc:
If unit initiates combat and defeats foe, grants engage partner +4 to all seven basic stats while engaged.
[Dragon] Extra +1 to all stats.
[Backup] Extra +2 to Str.
[Cavalry] Extra +2 to Dex.
[Covert] Extra +2 to Spd.
[Armored] Extra +2 to Def.
[Flying] Extra +2 to Res.
[Mystical] Extra +2 to Mag.
[Qi Adept] Extra +2 to Lck.

dragonblast.name: Dragon Blast
dragonblast.desc:
Use to make two attacks against an adjacent foe with a sword and powerful magic beam.
[Dragon] +20% damage.
[Backup] Adds 20% of Str to sword attack.
[Mystical] Adds 20% of Mag to beam attack.
[Qi Adept] Breaks foe.

bondblast.name: Bond Blast
bondblast.desc:
Use to make a sword attack from the unit and engage partner followed by a magic beam attack against an adjacent foe.
[Dragon] +20% damage.
[Backup] +20% of Str to sword.
[Mystical] +20% of Mag to beam.
[Qi Adept] Breaks foe.

divinelyinspiring.name: Divinely Inspiring
divinelyinspiring.desc: Adjacent allies deal +3 damage and take 1 less damage.

alabasterduty.name: Alabaster Duty
alabasterduty.desc: If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Crit+5 during combat to both of them.

verdantfaith.name: Verdant Faith
verdantfaith.desc: If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Hit+10 during combat to both of them.

crimsoncheer.name: Crimson Cheer
crimsoncheer.desc: If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Avo+10 during combat to both of them.

selfimprover.name: Self-Improver
selfimprover.desc: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Str+2 for 1 turn.

energized.name: Energized
energized.desc: When unit recovers HP using an item, grants Str+2 for 1 turn.

movedtotears.name: Moved to Tears
movedtotears.desc: When an ally joins a chain attack in this unit's combat, unit deals +2 damage.

gentleflower.name: Gentle Flower
gentleflower.desc: Recovery items used by allies within 2 spaces heal +50% HP.

fairytalefolk.name: Fairy-Tale Folk
fairytalefolk.desc: If a male and a female ally are adjacent within 2 spaces, unit deals +2 damage during combat.

admiration.name: Admiration
admiration.desc: If two female allies are adjacent within 2 spaces, this unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

fairfight.name: Fair Fight
fairfight.desc: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit+15 to unit and foe if foe is able to counterattack.

aspiringhero.name: Aspiring Hero
aspiringhero.desc: If no other units are within 1 space of unit or foe, grants Hit+20 at a cost of Avo-10 during combat.

meditation.name: Meditation
meditation.desc: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Res+2 for 1 turn.

getbehindme.name: Get Behind Me!
getbehindme.desc: When an ally within 2 spaces is attacked, grants Str+3 to unit for 1 turn.

sharespoils.name: Share Spoils
sharespoils.desc: If there is an ally within 1 space, grants Hit/Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 to unit.

generosity.name: Generosity
generosity.desc: When this unit uses a healing item, adjacent allies also recover the same amount of HP.

singleminded.name: Single-Minded
singleminded.desc: During combat with a foe who was also unit's most recent opponent, grants Hit+20.

notquite.name: Not *Quite*
notquite.desc: If foe initiates combat, inflicts Hit-10 on that foe during combat.

blindingflash.name: Blinding Flash
blindingflash.desc: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Avo-10 on foe during combat.

bigpersonality.name: Big Personality
bigpersonality.desc: When unit uses a healing staff, grants range +1. (Actually works for all staves except rescue.)

stunningsmile.name: Stunning Smile
stunningsmile.desc: If foe is male, inflicts Avo-20 on that foe during combat.

disarmingsigh.name: Disarming Sigh
disarmingsigh.desc: If foe is male, inflicts Hit-20 on that foe during combat.

racketofsolm.name: Racket of Solm
racketofsolm.desc: Inflicts Crit-5 on foes within 3 spaces.

knightlyescort.name: Knightly Escort
knightlyescort.desc: When 2 or more female allies are within 2 spaces, grants Hit/Avo+5 to unit and those allies.

bloodfury.name: Blood Fury
bloodfury.desc: If unit's HP is not at max after combat, grants Crit+10 as long as unit's HP stays below max.

charmer.name: Charmer
charmer.desc: During combat with a foe who was also unit's most recent opponent, inflicts Crit-10 on that foe.

partyanimal.name: Party Animal
partyanimal.desc: Grants a bonus to Hit and Avo equal to 3× the number of allies and foes within 2 spaces.

seconds.name: Seconds?
seconds.desc: On eating a packed lunch, unit may obtain another of the same item. Trigger %=Lck.

makeakilling.name: Make a Killing
makeakilling.desc: May obtain 500G when unit defeats a foe. Trigger %=Lck.

expertise.name: Expertise
expertise.desc:
Grants unit enhanced stat growth when leveling up.
Doubles class growths.

trainedtokill.name: Trained to Kill
trainedtokill.desc: While unit occupies terrain that provides an Avo bonus, grants Crit+15.

curiousdance.name: Curious Dance
curiousdance.desc: At start of turn, allies within 2 spaces of unit recover 10% of their max HP.

weaponinsight.name: Weapon Insight
weaponinsight.desc: If unit is equipped with a weapon of lower level than foe's, grants Crit+20 during combat.

willtowin.name: Will to Win
willtowin.desc: If unit's HP is 50% or less at start of combat, grants Hit/Avo+20 during combat.

fellprotection.name: Fell Protection
fellprotection.desc: Adjacent allies deal +1 damage and take 3 less damage.

contemplative.name: Contemplative
contemplative.desc: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Def+2 for 1 turn.

runthrough.name: Run Through
runthrough.desc: Use to attack an adjacent foe, then move to the space opposite that foe.

braveassist.name: Brave Assist
braveassist.desc: If unit's HP is at max while unit makes a chain attack, unit attacks twice.

pincerattack.name: Pincer Attack
pincerattack.desc: If unit initiates combat while an ally is on the opposite side of the foe, always follow up (if weapon allows).

reforge.name: Reforge
reforge.desc: If unit's HP is 11 or more and an adjacent ally is broken after combat, sacrifices 10 HP and removes the break status from that ally.

smash+.name: Smash+
smash+.desc: When making a smash attack, push the target 2 spaces instead of 1.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.desc: Unit deals +50% damage against broken foes.

nodistractions.name: No Distractions
nodistractions.desc: Grants Crit+10 during combat with a foe that can't counter.

carefulaim.name: Careful Aim
carefulaim.desc: If unit initiates combat without moving first, grants Hit+40 during combat.

swap.name: Swap
swap.desc: Use to switch places with an adjacent ally.

allieddefense.name: Allied Defense
allieddefense.desc: If unit is between an ally and a foe, reduces damage to unit by 3 during combat with that foe.

pivot.name: Pivot
pivot.desc: Use to move to the opposite side of an adjacent ally.

hobble.name: Hobble
hobble.desc: If unit initiates combat with a knife, inflicts Mov-2 on foe for 1 turn.

cleartheway.name: Clear the Way
cleartheway.desc: Unit's space and adjacent spaces have a movement cost of 1 for allies.

airraid.name: Air Raid
airraid.desc: If unit initiates combat from a space a foe cannot enter, grants Spd+5 during combat.

pass.name: Pass
pass.desc: Foes do not block this unit's movement.

spellharmony.name: Spell Harmony
spellharmony.desc: If unit initiates combat with a tome, grants Atk equal to the number of adjacent allies with tomes.

chaosstyle.name: Chaos Style
chaosstyle.desc: If unit initiates combat with a physical attack against a foe armed with magic or vice versa, grants Spd+3 during combat.

diffusehealer.name: Diffuse Healer
diffusehealer.desc: When unit is healed by a staff, all adjacent allies also recover 50% of the HP that the unit recovered.

selfhealing.name: Self-Healing
selfhealing.desc: Unit can target itself with healing staves.

divinespirit.name: Divine Spirit
divinespirit.desc: Unit's engage meter is shortened one step.

fellspirit.name: Fell Spirit
fellspirit.desc: At the start of each turn, unit's engage meter is filled by 1.

darkspirit.name: Dark Spirit
darkspirit.desc: Inflicts -1 to the engage meters of foes within 2 spaces at the start of the turn.

reference.Class:
Fell Child
Fell Monarch
Great Fell Dragon

goldenlotus.name: Golden Lotus
goldenlotus.desc: During combat, may prevent 50% of physical damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.

ignis.name: Ignis
ignis.desc: During combat, may add half of Str to magic damage or half of Mag to all other damage. Trigger %=Dex.

sol.name: Sol
sol.desc: Unit may recover HP=50% damage dealt. Trigger %=Dex.

luna.name: Luna
luna.desc: While making an attack, may ignore half of foe's Def/Res. Trigger %=Dex.

graspingvoid.name: Grasping Void
graspingvoid.desc: When attacking with a tome, unit may deal extra damage = half of foe's Mag. Trigger %=Dex.

worldtree.name: World Tree
worldtree.desc: When unit uses a staff, may not consume a use. Trigger %=Dex.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.desc: While making a physical attack, may calculate damage with 150% of Def instead of Str. Trigger %=Dex.

backatyou.name: Back at You
backatyou.desc: When countering, unit may deal extra damage = half of damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.

soulblade.name: Soulblade
soulblade.desc: When attacking with a sword, damage is calculated using average of foe's Def and Res.

specialdance.name: Special Dance
specialdance.desc: If unit uses Dance, grants Dex/Spd/Lck+3 to target for 1 turn.

sympathetic.name: Sympathetic
sympathetic.desc: If foe initiates combat and if unit's HP is 50% or less, unit takes 5 less damage.

deadlyblade.name: Deadly Blade
deadlyblade.desc: If unit initiates combat with a sword, grants Crit+10 during combat.

battlewise.name: Battlewise
battlewise.desc: Grants a stacking Crit+1 each time unit initiates combat and defeats a foe. Bonus lasts for the rest of the battle. (Max +10)

windsweep.name: Windsweep
windsweep.desc: If unit initiates combat with a sword, foe may not counterattack. Trigger %=Lck.

greatthunder.name: Great Thunder
greatthunder.desc: If unit uses Thunder, Elthunder, or Thoron, deals +20% damage.

bane.name: Bane
bane.desc: May reduce foe's HP to 1. Trigger %=half of Dex. (Certain foes are immune to this effect.)

mercy.name: Mercy
mercy.desc: If dealing enough damage to defeat foe, instead leaves foe with 1 HP.

ragingfire.name: Raging Fire
ragingfire.desc: If unit uses Fire, Elfire, or Bolganone, deals +20% damage.

strongarm.name: Strong Arm
strongarm.desc: Grants Hit+20 while unit is equipped with a smash weapon.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.desc: Avoids foe's attack when unit would be defeated. Trigger %=Lck. (Max 50%)

direthunder.name: Dire Thunder
direthunder.desc: When unit initiates combat with Thunder equipped, unit attacks twice. (Excludes Elthunder and Thoron.)

rightfulruler.name: Rightful Ruler
rightfulruler.desc: Adds +5% to trigger rate for all skills with trigger rates.

healtouch.name: Healtouch
healtouch.desc: When unit heals an ally with a staff, restores +5 HP to target.

drawback.name: Draw Back
drawback.desc: Use to move 1 space away from adjacent ally and pull the ally along.

gigaexcalibur.name: Giga Excalibur
gigaexcalibur.desc: If unit initiates combat with Excalibur, deals +20% damage.

windadept.name: Wind Adept
windadept.desc: If unit initiates combat with Wind equipped, unit may attack twice. Trigger %=Dex. (Excludes Elwind and Excalibur.)

shove.name: Shove
shove.desc: Use to push an adjacent ally with less Bld 1 space away.

flickeringflower.name: Flickering Flower
flickeringflower.desc: If unit initiates combat, freezes foe. Trigger % = total damage dealt.

paraselene.name: Paraselene
paraselene.desc: Use to make an attack against an adjacent foe, then move 1 space away from that foe after combat.

windgod.name: Wind God
windgod.desc: If unit's HP=100%, grants range +1 with bows.

chivalry.name: Chivalry
chivalry.desc: If unit initiates combat while foe's HP=100%, unit deals +2 damage and takes 2 less damage.

bushido.name: Bushido
bushido.desc: If unit's level is higher than foe's, grants Crit+10 during combat, and unit deals +2 damage and takes 2 less damage.

lethality.name: Lethality
lethality.desc: When landing a critical hit, instantly kills foe. Trigger %=30. (Excludes certain powerful foes.)

surestrike.name: Sure Strike
surestrike.desc: If unit initiates combat, attacks are guaranteed to hit. Trigger %=Dex

fortifydef.name: Fortify Def
fortifydef.desc: Grants Def+2 to adjacent allies for 1 turn at start of player phase.

friendlyrivalry.name: Friendly Rivalry
friendlyrivalry.desc: At start of player phase, the Emblem will randomly switch to Edelgard, Dimitri, or Claude.

gambit.name: Gambit
gambit.desc: Effects change based on synced Emblem.

assemblygambit.name: Assembly Gambit
assemblygambit.desc: Use to attack an adjacent foe, then move 1 space away after combat. Target foe moves to unit's previous space.

flamegambit.name: Flame Gambit
flamegambit.desc: Use when synced with Edelgard to attack a foe, then set the target foe's space and nearby spaces on fire.

shieldgambit.name: Shield Gambit
shieldgambit.desc: Use when synced with Dimitri to negate damage from first attacks of ranged foes targeting unit in next enemy phase.

poisongambit.name: Poison Gambit
poisongambit.desc: Use when synced with Claude to attack a foe, then poison target and all foes adjacent to it after combat.

weaponsync.name: Weapon Sync
weaponsync.desc: If unit initiates combat using same weapon type as the synced Emblem, grants Atk+5. If engaged, grants Atk+5 regardless of weapon type.

weaponsync+.name: Weapon Sync+
weaponsync+.desc: If unit initiates combat using same weapon type as the synced Emblem, grants Atk+7. If engaged, grants Atk+7 regardless of weapon type.

combatarts.name: Combat Arts
combatarts.desc:
Enables use of Edelgard, Dimitri, or Claude's Combat Art. Spends some remaining engage turns.
[Dragon] +10% damage.
[Covert] Avo+20.

ragingstorm.name: Raging Storm
ragingstorm.desc: After combat, take another action. (Spend 3 turns.)

atrocity.name: Atrocity
atrocity.desc: Attack at double weapon's Mt. (Spend 1 turn.)

fallenstar.name: Fallen Star
fallenstar.desc: Avoid foe's attacks during next combat. (Spend 1 turn.)

housesunite.name: Houses Unite
housesunite.desc:
Use to attack with Aymr, Areadbhar, and Failnaught at 50% damage.
*If Byleth is adjacent*: After combat, take another action.
[Dragon] +10% damage.
[Cavalry] +10% damage with Areadbhar.
[Covert] +10% damage with Failnaught.
[Armored] +10% damage with Aymr.
[Qi Adept] Breaks foe.

housesunite+.name: Houses Unite+
housesunite+.desc:
Use to attack with Aymr, Areadbhar, and Failnaught at 50% damage. After combat, take another action.
[Dragon] +10% damage.
[Cavalry] +10% damage with Areadbhar.
[Covert] +10% damage with Failnaught.
[Armored] +10% damage with Aymr.
[Qi Adept] Breaks foe.

lightsphere.name: Lightsphere
lightsphere.desc: If unit initiates combat, halves chance of receiving critical hit from foe.

starsphere.name: Starsphere
starsphere.desc:
Grants unit enhanced stat growth when leveling up.
15% to all growth rates.

lifesphere.name: Lifesphere
lifesphere.desc: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 20 HP and heals status effects.

lifesphere+.name: Lifesphere+
lifesphere+.desc: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 30 HP and heals status effects.

lifesphere++.name: Lifesphere++
lifesphere++.desc: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 40 HP and heals status effects.

geosphere.name: Geosphere
geosphere.desc: At start of player phase, if there are allies adjacent to unit, grants Def/Res+3 to unit and those allies for 1 turn.

geosphere+.name: Geosphere+
geosphere+.desc: At start of player phase, if there are allies adjacent to unit, grants Def/Res+5 to unit and those allies for 1 turn.

draconicform.name: Draconic Form
draconicform.desc:
Unit transforms into and fights as a dragon while engaged. Grants +10 to max HP and +5 to Bld and all basic stats.
[Armored] Negates terrain damage.
[Mystical] Grants an extra Res+5.

divineblessing.name: Divine Blessing
divineblessing.desc:
Use to grant 1 ally a Revival Stone.
*If Marth is adjacent*: If ally is not synced, fully restore HP. If ally is synced, +3 to engage meter. If ally is engaged, restore engage turns.
[Dragon] Restore 20 HP to ally.
[Qi Adept] Heal their status effects.

divineblessing+.name: Divine Blessing+
divineblessing+.desc:
Use to grant 1 ally a Revival Stone. If ally is not synced, fully restore HP. If ally is synced, +3 to engage meter. If ally is engaged, restore engage turns.
[Dragon] Restore 20 HP to ally.
[Qi Adept] Heal their status effects.

bowguard1.name: Bow Guard 1
bowguard1.desc: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

bowguard2.name: Bow Guard 2
bowguard2.desc: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

bowguard3.name: Bow Guard 3
bowguard3.desc: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

bowguard4.name: Bow Guard 4
bowguard4.desc: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

bowguard5.name: Bow Guard 5
bowguard5.desc: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

specialguard1.name: Special Guard 1
specialguard1.desc: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

specialguard2.name: Special Guard 2
specialguard2.desc: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

specialguard3.name: Special Guard 3
specialguard3.desc: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

specialguard4.name: Special Guard 4
specialguard4.desc: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

specialguard5.name: Special Guard 5
specialguard5.desc: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

frostdomain.name: Frost Domain
frostdomain.desc: At start of turn, applies frost to terrain within 2 spaces of unit.

quickriposte.name: Quick Riposte
quickriposte.desc: If unit's HP is 80% or more and foe initiates combat, unit will always follow up (if weapon allows).

quickriposte+.name: Quick Riposte+
quickriposte+.desc: If unit's HP is 60% or more and foe initiates combat, unit will always follow up (if weapon allows).

heavyattack.name: Heavy Attack
heavyattack.desc: When making a physical attack, if an equipped weapon's Wt exceeds unit's Bld, adds excess as damage. (Max +5)

piercingglare.name: Piercing Glare
piercingglare.desc: Use when HP is full to consume 20% of max HP and prevent foes from entering the 4 spaces diagonally adjacent to unit for 1 turn.

adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.desc: When hit by a foe's attack, grants Def+2 for a physical attack or Res+2 for a magical attack after combat. Lasts until end of battle, or until activated again.

adaptability+.name: Adaptability+
adaptability+.desc: When hit by a foe's attack, grants Def+3 for a physical attack or Res+3 for a magical attack after combat. Lasts until end of battle, or until activated again.

impenetrable.name: Impenetrable
impenetrable.desc:
If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+30% during combat.
[Dragon] Ddg+50%.
[Cavalry] Grants immunity to freeze.
[Armored] Grants Def+50% instead of +30%.
[Flying] Grants Res+50% instead of +30%.

stormseye.name: Storm's Eye
stormseye.desc:
Grants immunity to break. Foe cannot follow up. Unit follows up. Lasts 1 turn. Sword/axe only.
*If Lyn is adjacent*: Unit counters before foe's first attack.
[Dragon] Prevent one critical hit.
[Backup] Crit+20.
[Covert] Avo+30.

stormseye+.name: Storm's Eye+
stormseye+.desc:
Grants immunity to break. Foe cannot follow up. Unit counters before foe's first attack and follows up. Lasts 1 turn. Sword/axe only.
[Dragon] Prevent one critical hit.
[Backup] Crit+20.
[Covert] Avo+30.

animafocus.name: Anima Focus
animafocus.desc: When using tomes, unit inflicts Def-3 with fire, Hit-20 with thunder, or Mov-2 with wind magic for 1 turn.

keeninsight.name: Keen Insight
keeninsight.desc: When unit deals Effective damage, deal +5 damage.

keeninsight+.name: Keen Insight+
keeninsight+.desc: When unit deals Effective damage, deal +7 damage.

assigndecoy.name: Assign Decoy
assigndecoy.desc: Use to make one chosen ally more likely to be targeted by enemies for 1 turn. Effect is removed after ally is targeted by or otherwise damaged by foes 3 times.

blockrecovery.name: Block Recovery
blockrecovery.desc: When attacking a broken foe with a tome, grants a chance the foe will remain broken. Chance increases with high Spd.

flare.name: Flare
flare.desc:
When attacking with tomes, inflicts Res-20% on foe, and unit recovers 50% of damage dealt.
[Dragon] Doubles crit rate.
[Mystical] Extra -10% to foe's Res.
[Qi Adept] Unit recovers 100% of damage dealt instead.

cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
cataclysm.desc:
Use to attack foes in an area with fire, thunder and wind magic at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.
*If Ike is adjacent*: Increases range.
[Dragon] Sets terrain on fire.
[Mystical] +10% damage.
[Qi Adept] 20% chance of breaking target.

cataclysm+.name: Cataclysm+
cataclysm+.desc:
Use to attack foes in an area with fire, thunder and wind magic at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.
[Dragon] Sets terrain on fire.
[Mystical] +10% damage.
[Qi Adept] 20% chance of breaking target.

groundswell.name: Groundswell
groundswell.desc: After unit acts or waits in flames, miasma, or similar terrain effect, unit clears effect and recovers 10 HP.

detoxify.name: Detoxify
detoxify.desc: Cures poison at start of turn.

decisivestrike.name: Decisive Strike
decisivestrike.desc: If unit initiates combat and lands a critical, deals 5 damage to foe after combat.

decisivestrike+.name: Decisive Strike+
decisivestrike+.desc: If unit initiates combat and lands a critical, deals 10 damage to foe after combat.

soar.name: Soar
soar.desc:
Grants Mov+2. Unit can cross terrain as if flying.
[Dragon] If unit initiates combat, deals damage to foes within 2 spaces equal to 10% of their max HP after combat.
[Cavalry] Grants an extra Mov+2.
[Flying] Grants an extra Mov+1.

darkinferno.name: Dark Inferno
darkinferno.desc:
Use to deal damage to foes on certain spaces near unit and set those spaces on fire.
*If Corrin is adjacent*: Increases range.
[Dragon] Increases area of effect.
[Mystical] +20% damage.
[Qi Adept] Adds Glow to adjacent spaces.

darkinferno+.name: Dark Inferno+
darkinferno+.desc:
Use to deal damage to foes on certain spaces near unit and set those spaces on fire.
[Dragon] Increases area of effect.
[Mystical] +20% damage.
[Qi Adept] Adds Glow to adjacent spaces.

axeguard1.name: Axe Guard 1
axeguard1.desc: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

axeguard2.name: Axe Guard 2
axeguard2.desc: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

axeguard3.name: Axe Guard 3
axeguard3.desc: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

axeguard4.name: Axe Guard 4
axeguard4.desc: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

axeguard5.name: Axe Guard 5
axeguard5.desc: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

magicguard1.name: Magic Guard 1
magicguard1.desc: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

magicguard2.name: Magic Guard 2
magicguard2.desc: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

magicguard3.name: Magic Guard 3
magicguard3.desc: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

magicguard4.name: Magic Guard 4
magicguard4.desc: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

magicguard5.name: Magic Guard 5
magicguard5.desc: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

lanceguard1.name: Lance Guard 1
lanceguard1.desc: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

lanceguard2.name: Lance Guard 2
lanceguard2.desc: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

lanceguard3.name: Lance Guard 3
lanceguard3.desc: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

lanceguard4.name: Lance Guard 4
lanceguard4.desc: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

lanceguard5.name: Lance Guard 5
lanceguard5.desc: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

convoy.name: Convoy
convoy.desc: Use to deposit or retrieve weapons and items.

spconversion.name: SP Conversion
spconversion.desc: Grants +20 SP for each defeated foe. Triggers even without a ring or bracelet equipped.

reprisal.name: Reprisal
reprisal.desc: If unit's HP is not full, adds 30% of lost HP to Atk.

reprisal+.name: Reprisal+
reprisal+.desc: If unit's HP is not full, adds 50% of lost HP to Atk.

levelboost.name: Level Boost
levelboost.desc: When unit defeats a foe of a higher level, grants Lvl+1 until the end of battle. (Max +3)

bookofworlds.name: Book of Worlds
bookofworlds.desc: Book of Worlds advances 1 stage (to max 5) for each consecutive round that unit uses Wait. Reverts to base stage if unit triggers the effect.

bookiseal.name: Book I: Seal
bookiseal.desc: If unit initiates combat, freezes foe after combat.

bookiiflame.name: Book II: Flame
bookiiflame.desc: If unit initiates combat, freezes foe and sets foe's space on fire after combat.

bookiiideath.name: Book III: Death
bookiiideath.desc: If unit initiates combat, deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe's space on fire after combat.

bookivdream.name: Book IV: Dream
bookivdream.desc: If unit initiates combat, restores HP equal to damage dealt during combat, then deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe's space on fire after combat.

bookvscience.name: Book V: Science
bookvscience.desc: If unit initiates combat, restores HP to self and adjacent allies equal to damage dealt during combat, then deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe's space on fire after combat.

contract.name: Contract
contract.desc:
Use to grant another action to an adjacent ally who has already acted. (Ally cannot move.)
[Dragon] Grants Str/Mag/Def/Res+2 to ally during action.
[Backup] Unit participates in chain attack during ally action.
[Covert] Grants Hit/Avo+30 to ally during action.

summonhero.name: Summon Hero
summonhero.desc:
Use to summon a random unit.
[Dragon] Summons a powerful unit.
[Backup] Summoned unit has the "Dual Strike" skill.
[Cavarly] Summoned unit gets Mov+1.

bruteforce.name: Brute Force
bruteforce.desc: While making a physical attack, critical hits deal increased damage.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: If unit's attack triggers a chain attack, increases chain attack accuracy to 90%.

surpriseattack.name: Surprise Attack
surpriseattack.desc: If unit initiates combat from terrain that provides an Avo bonus, foe cannot counterattack.

rally.name: Rally
rally.desc: Use to grant adjacent allies +3 to all seven basic stats for 1 turn.

rally+.name: Rally+
rally+.desc: Use to grant allies within 2 spaces +3 to all seven basic stats for 1 turn.

rallyspectrum.name: Rally Spectrum
rallyspectrum.desc: Use to grant adjacent allies +3 to all seven basic stats for 1 turn.

otherhalf.name: Other Half
otherhalf.desc:
If unit initiates combat, Robin chain attacks. Grants Mag+10 while engaged.
[Dragon] Robin chain attacks 2 times.
[Backup] Guaranteed hit with chain attack.
[Covert] Grants Mov+1 while engaged.

gigalevinsword.name: Giga Levin Sword
gigalevinsword.desc:
Use to attack with a magic sword. Magic attack that uses physical attack power. Swords only.
[Dragon] Deals extra damage = half of Str.
[Flying] Deals extra damage = Bld.
[Mystical] Deals extra damage = half of Mag.

gigalevinsword+.name: Giga Levin Sword+
gigalevinsword+.desc:
Use to attack with a magic sword. Magic attack that uses physical attack power. Swords only. Adjacent allies chain attack.
[Dragon] Deals extra damage = half of Str.
[Flying] Deals extra damage = Bld.
[Mystical] Deals extra damage = half of Mag.

knifeguard1.name: Knife Guard 1
knifeguard1.desc: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

knifeguard2.name: Knife Guard 2
knifeguard2.desc: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

knifeguard3.name: Knife Guard 3
knifeguard3.desc: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

knifeguard4.name: Knife Guard 4
knifeguard4.desc: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

knifeguard5.name: Knife Guard 5
knifeguard5.desc: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

swordguard1.name: Sword Guard 1
swordguard1.desc: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

swordguard2.name: Sword Guard 2
swordguard2.desc: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

swordguard3.name: Sword Guard 3
swordguard3.desc: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

swordguard4.name: Sword Guard 4
swordguard4.desc: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

swordguard5.name: Sword Guard 5
swordguard5.desc: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

letfly.name: Let Fly
letfly.desc: Use to perform a guaranteed-hit, area-of-effect attack at the start of the next player phase. Unit loses equipped weapon.

packhunter.name: Pack Hunter
packhunter.desc: Allies of the same class as unit within 3 spaces participate in chain attacks.

protective.name: Protective
protective.desc: If foe initiates combat against Rafal, grants Crit+10 to unit for 1 turn.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.desc: When an ally within 2 spaces defeats a foe, grants Crit+10 to unit for 1 turn.

woundedpride.name: Wounded Pride
woundedpride.desc: When an ally within 2 spaces defeats a foe, grants Crit+10 to unit for 1 turn.

friendlyboost.name: Friendly Boost
friendlyboost.desc: When unit defeats a foe, grants Hit+20 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.

survivalplan.name: Survival Plan
survivalplan.desc: When there are more foes than allies within 3 spaces, grants Avo+20.

knightlycode.name: Knightly Code
knightlycode.desc: If foe initiates combat and unit is adjacent to an ally, unit takes 2 less damage.

selfdefense.name: Self-Defense
selfdefense.desc: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Str+2 for 1 turn.

fiercebloom.name: Fierce Bloom
fiercebloom.desc: Recovery items used by allies within 2 spaces heal +50% HP.

thisendshere.name: This Ends Here
thisendshere.desc: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit+15 to unit and foe if foe is able to counterattack.

showoff.name: Show-Off
showoff.desc: When an ally within 2 spaces is attacked, grants Str+3 to unit for 1 turn.

finalsay.name: Final Say
finalsay.desc: During combat with a foe who was also unit's most recent opponent, grants Hit+20.

stealthassist.name: Stealth Assist
stealthassist.desc: When unit uses a healing staff, grants range +1.

dignityofsolm.name: Dignity of Solm
dignityofsolm.desc: Inflicts Crit-5 on foes within 3 spaces.

weardown.name: Wear Down
weardown.desc: During combat with a foe who was also unit's most recent opponent, inflicts Crit-10 on that foe.

miasmadomain.name: Miasma Domain
miasmadomain.desc: At start of turn, applies miasma to terrain within 2 spaces of unit.

resistemblems.name: Resist Emblems
resistemblems.desc: When attacked with an engage attack, prevents 20% of damage.

spuremblems.name: Spur Emblems
spuremblems.desc: At start of player phase, fills adjacent allies' engage meters by 1.
